title: Dashboard loads and displays notices correctly
description: Verify that the Dashboard loads successfully and displays a list of notices with correct title, status badges, date, and writer information fetched from backend.

steps.description: Navigate to the Dashboard page.
Check that the notice list is fetched from backend and rendered.
Verify each notice entry shows correct title, status badge, date, and writer.
Verify statistical charts reflect accurate counts and data.

title: Write Notice form submits valid notice successfully
description: Verify the Notice Write form accepts inputs for all required fields, validates them, and submits a new notice which appears in pending status.

steps.description: Navigate to the Write Notice form.
Input valid Title, Content, Type, Importance, Recipients, and Scheduled dispatch time.
Submit the form.
Check successful submission response from backend.
Verify new notice appears on Dashboard with status 'PENDING'.

title: Write Notice form validation rejects incomplete inputs
description: Verify that submitting the Notice Write form with missing required fields prompts validation errors and blocks submission.

steps.description: Navigate to the Write Notice form.
Leave required fields empty or input invalid values.
Attempt to submit the form.
Check that validation error messages appear for the missing/invalid fields.
Ensure the form is not submitted to backend.

title: Only authorized managers can view and use approval options for pending notices
description: Verify that approval and rejection options only appear for users with manager role and only for notices that have PENDING status.

steps.description: Login as a normal user and navigate to Notice Detail page of a PENDING notice.
Check that Approve and Reject buttons are not visible.
Login as a manager user and navigate to Notice Detail page of a PENDING notice.
Verify Approve and Reject buttons are visible and functional.
Navigate to Notice Detail page of an APPROVED notice as a manager.
Verify that approval buttons are not visible.

title: Manager approves a pending notice successfully
description: Verify that when a manager approves a notice, the notice status updates accordingly, an Outlook calendar event is created, and notifications are dispatched.

steps.description: Login as manager and navigate to Notice Detail page of a PENDING notice.
Click the Approve button.
Check backend approval API returns success.
Verify the notice status changes from PENDING to APPROVED.
Confirm that an event is created in Outlook 'IT Notice Schedule' resource calendar.
Validate that multi-channel notifications (email, company messenger, portal, KZ mobile app) are dispatched.

title: Manager rejects a pending notice
description: Verify that when a manager rejects a notice, the notice status updates accordingly and no calendar event or notifications are sent.

steps.description: Login as manager and navigate to Notice Detail page of a PENDING notice.
Click the Reject button.
Check backend rejection API returns success.
Verify the notice status changes from PENDING to REJECTED.
Confirm no calendar event is created for the rejected notice.
Validate that no notifications are dispatched.

title: Completion notice updates Outlook calendar event visual state and notifies recipients
description: Verify that registering a completion notice updates the corresponding calendar event visually and dispatches appropriate notifications to recipients.

steps.description: Login as admin and register a completion notice linked to an approved notice.
Verify the corresponding Outlook calendar event's visual state (e.g., color or status) is updated.
Confirm notifications are sent to all recipients about the completion.

title: Notification dispatch respects selected alert channels
description: Verify that notifications are sent only via the channels selected (email, company messenger, portal, KZ mobile app) during notice dispatch.

steps.description: Create and approve a notice with selected subset of notification channels.
Verify dispatch messages are sent through only the selected channels.
Confirm no messages are sent through unselected channels.

title: Dashboard correctly updates counts of notices by approval and dispatch status
description: Verify that the Dashboard displays accurate counts for notices segmented by approval status and dispatch status charts after changes in state.

steps.description: Perform multiple notice operations: submission, approval, rejection, completion.
Navigate to Dashboard.
Verify counts and charts update to reflect current statuses accurately.

title: History logs capture all approval and dispatch events with search and filter
description: Verify that the notice history and approval logs record every approval, rejection, and dispatch event and that filtering and searching history works correctly.

steps.description: Generate a set of notices with statuses: approved, rejected, dispatched.
Navigate to History and Approval logs page.
Check all events are logged with correct timestamps, notice IDs, and user info.
Use filters for notice type, status, date range.
Verify the filtered list matches criteria and updates dynamically.
Search history by keyword, notice title, or user name.
Confirm search results show only matching records.

title: Responsive UI renders correctly on desktop and mobile webviews
description: Verify that the application user interface adjusts layout correctly across various browser window sizes including desktop and mobile devices without layout break or functional loss.

steps.description: Open the app on desktop web browser at multiple resolutions.
Verify all UI components render properly without overlap or clipping.
Open the app on mobile device browsers and simulate different viewport sizes.
Verify responsive elements (navbars, buttons, forms, charts) adapt layout and remain usable.
Verify that interactive elements remain accessible and no scrolling or zoom issues occur.

title: User access via SSO loads application without separate login
description: Verify that users authenticated via Single Sign-On access the IT Notice Management System without needing to enter credentials again and proper permissions apply to their roles.

steps.description: Access the application URL via an authenticated SSO session.
Verify user gains access directly to Dashboard without login prompt.
Verify user's permissions (e.g., ability to approve notices) conform to their role.
Attempt to access approval functions as a non-manager user.
Verify access is denied or approve/reject controls are hidden.

title: API failure handling when retrieving or submitting notices
description: Verify the application handles backend API failures gracefully, showing appropriate error messages and allowing retry options.

steps.description: Simulate backend API failure for getNotices request.
Verify an error message is displayed on Dashboard.
Simulate backend API failure during notice submission.
Verify user receives clear error feedback and form data is retained.
Provide a retry mechanism and retry the failed request.
Verify successful retry loads data or submits form.

title: Edge case: Schedule dispatch for immediate and future times
description: Verify notices scheduled for immediate dispatch and those scheduled for future dispatch behave correctly with respect to approval workflow, calendar event timing, and notifications.

steps.description: Create and submit a notice with immediate dispatch time.
Verify after approval, calendar event and notifications are created and sent immediately.
Create and submit a notice with future scheduled dispatch time.
Verify after approval, calendar event is created with correct scheduled time.
Validate that notifications are dispatched according to scheduled dispatch time.
